channel.title: Cybersecurity on Jared Baron Panares
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on Jared Baron Panares

item.title: Reviewing Cyberstart America
item.description: Anecdote It was January of 2021. It doesn’t get cold where I come from, but this year started off chilly. I remember the countless times I would sit on my computer, open up a VM, and take a sip of hot cocoa. Those were my first memories of CyberStart America: comfort, nostalgia, and warmth. Intro Originally a program solely for women in STEM, CyberStart America was soon established around 3-4 years ago.

item.title: Competing in CyberStart America
item.description: Cyber Journey CyberStart America is the most enjoyable way to discover your talent, advance your skills and win scholarships in cybersecurity! - CyberStart America For this competition, I was titled National Cyber Scholarship Scholar with Honors in 2023 and awarded $9,000 worth of course material. During this period, I solved all but one challenge and accumulated 140,000+ points to earn the CyberStart America Gold Award. Prior to this award, I had competed in the competition before and was titled NCSF Finalist and given the CA Gold Award, each respectively twice.
